title: Tom Hardy leaves mums hot under the collar after CBeebies special: 'Way too sexy'
text:
Tom Hardy leaves mums hot under the collar after CBeebies special: 'Way too sexy' Tom Hardy leaves mums hot under the collar after CBeebies special: 'Way too sexy' AFTER the success of his storytelling session on New Year's Eve, Tom Hardy returned to CBeebies yesterday evening to read another bedtime tale. PUBLISHED: 07:55, Wed, Feb 15, 2017 | UPDATED: 08:06, Wed, Feb 15, 2017 
The actor seemingly left mothers across the country rather flustered when he settled down with his dog Woodstock to host the channel's BedTime Stories. 
Wrapped up in a red jacket and wearing binoculars, he read Tom McLaughlin's The Cloudspotter for the Valentine's Day special . 
The 39-year-old left many viewers hot under the collar as he ended the show with him whispering: "Cloud spotting with a best friend is definitely more enjoyable. Especially if your best friend is a dog. 
"And, I've spotted that you're not in bed yet. Quick! Go on. Get yourself tucked up and I'll see you very soon for another bedtime story." Related articles
